info.name: FoodMission Knowledge API
info.description:
Collection for FoodMission Knowledge/Quiz API endpoints.

**IMPORTANT:** Make sure the `base_url` variable is set to `http://localhost:3000` (or your backend server URL) in your Postman environment.

The API uses the global prefix `/api/v1`, so all endpoints are under `/api/v1/knowledge`.

**Authentication:** All endpoints require a valid JWT token with 'user' or 'admin' role.

request.description:
Creates a new knowledge/quiz item. Requires authentication.

**Rate Limit:** 5 requests per minute

**Validation:**
- At least 2 options per question
- correctAnswer must be one of the options

Retrieves a paginated list of knowledge items with user progress if available.

**Rate Limit:** 10 requests per minute

**Query Parameters:**
- `page`: Page number
- `limit`: Items per page (max 100)
- `available`: Filter by availability (true/false)

Retrieves a specific knowledge item by ID with user progress if available.

**Rate Limit:** 10 requests per minute

Updates a knowledge item. Only the owner can update.

**Rate Limit:** 5 requests per minute

**Note:** All fields are optional. Only provided fields will be updated.

Updates the quiz content (questions). Only the owner can update.

**Rate Limit:** 5 requests per minute

Deletes a knowledge item. Only the owner can delete.

**Rate Limit:** 5 requests per minute

**Cascade:** Also deletes all user progress for this knowledge item.

Retrieves all progress entries for the authenticated user across all knowledge items.

**Rate Limit:** 10 requests per minute

Retrieves the authenticated user's progress for a specific knowledge item.

**Rate Limit:** 10 requests per minute

**Returns 404** if no progress exists yet.

Creates or updates progress for a knowledge item. Use this to start a quiz or save current state.

**Rate Limit:** 10 requests per minute

**Upsert:** Creates if doesn't exist, updates if it does.
Updates progress while taking the quiz. Save after each answered question.
Marks the quiz as completed with final score and answers.

Deletes the user's progress for a knowledge item. Use this to reset/restart a quiz.

**Rate Limit:** 5 requests per minute
